amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for the Army Corps of Engineers to finalize the environmental impact statement for the proposed Pebble Mine project.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 90 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to state that none of the funds in this act can be used for the Army Corps of Engineers to finalize the environmental impact statement for the proposed Pebble Mine project.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A119) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 201 (Roll no. 363).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A119) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 201 (Roll no. 363).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A119) offered by Mr. Huffman.
